name: Tomas Bulva
title: Web Developer
description:
I'm a full stack software developer with over a decade of experience. A polygot with experience ranging from building server apps in Node.js, php, websites front end apps in Angular, Ember, jQuery to iphone apps in Objective-C and Swift.

I have worked for companies ranging from global corporations to local businesses and agencys such as Electronic Arts, Sony Entertainment, Accenture, National Geographic, mhdezign, c|change inc.
